i1.name: Get Excited!
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Whenever an enemy {{tip|champion}}, {{tip|monster|epic monster}}, {{tip|turret}} or [[inhibitor]] dies within 3 seconds of being damaged by '''Jinx''', she gains {{sti|ms|{{as|175% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} which decays over 6 seconds.
Additionally, she gains {{sti|{{as|15% '''total''' attack speed}}}} and is allowed to exceed the {{tt|attack speed cap|normally 2.5 attacks per second}} for the same duration.
i1.notes:
* '''Jinx's''' ''attack speed cap'' is increased to {{fd|90.0}} for the duration, however this value is already beyond the technical limit for attack speed.
* '''Jinx''' will ''get excited'' from killing a {{ui|Rift Herald}} summoned by the enemy team with the {{ii|Eye of the Herald}} as well.

w1.name: Zap!
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jinx''' fires a shock blast in the target direction that deals {{as|physical damage}} to the first enemy it hits, {{tip|sight|revealing}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 2 seconds.
w1.notes: * ''Zap!'' is always cast from the original casting position.

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 160% AD)

  • Slow: %

r1.name: Super Mega Death Rocket!
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jinx''' fires a rocket in the target direction, granting {{tt|brief {{tip|sight}} of the area it flies through|cannot see into brush or through terrain}}. The rocket explodes upon colliding with an enemy champion, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to the champion and all enemies {{tt|in an area around them|centered on the initial target}} and {{tt|{{tip|sight|revealing}} the area around them|can see into brush and through terrain}} for 2 seconds.

The rocket deals {{passive progression/deprecated version|16|type=distance traveled|key=%|10 to 100|0 to 1500|formula=10% (+6% per 100 units travelled, up to +90%).}} damage based on travel distance, the {{as|'''bonus''' damage based on '''missing''' health}} is retained.
Enemies surrounding the main target take 80% damage. {{as|'''Bonus''' damage from '''missing''' health}} is based on each unit's own {{as|'''missing''' health}}.
leveling: {{st|Max. Physical Damage|{{ap|250 to 450}} {{as|(+ 150% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|25 to 35}}% of target's '''missing''' health)}}|Min. Physical Damage|{{ap|(250 to 450)*0.1}} {{as|(+ {{ap|150*0.1}}% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|25 to 35}}% of target's '''missing''' health)}}}}

{{st|Max. Secondary Damage|{{ap|(250 to 450)*0.8}} {{as|(+ {{ap|150*0.8}}% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|(25 to 35)*0.8}}% of target's '''missing''' health)}}|Min. Secondary Damage|{{ap|(250 to 450)*0.8*0.1}} {{as|(+ {{ap|150*0.8*0.1}}% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|(25 to 35)*0.8}}% of target's '''missing''' health)}}}}
r1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will not prevent the explosion.
* Cast location is determined at the start of cast time.
* The minimap icon of ''Super Mega Death Rocket'' can be seen by '''Jinx''' and all her allies.
